resistome: Resistome was identified using abritamr and mobsuite to determine if AMR mechanims identified from assemblies are possibly located on mobile elements.
* indicative of 90 - 99% identity and >90% coverage to a known resistance gene
^ indicative of 90 - 99% identity and 50%< coverage <90% to a known resistance gene
text in bracket indicates the AMR mechanim is possible on a plasmid (PLASMID_ACCESSION PLASMID_SPECIES)
